articles.title: Chevron: Workers at major Australia gas facilities to strike - BBC
articles.description: The Chevron plants account for more than 5% of the world's liquefied natural gas production.
articles.content:
Workers at two large liquefied natural gas (LNG) plants in Australia, operated by US energy giant Chevron, are set to go on strike from 7 September, in a move that could drive up global prices.
